name: SpEx
description:
SpEx is an Asteroids (Atari 1979) and Lunar Lander (Atari 1979) inspired video game.

You control a spaceship that you have to land on a landing pad on a planet to refuel. as you progress, the more landing pads you have to land on, and the less fuel they provide.Don't run out of fuel!

The controls are quite simple, use the left and right arrow keys to rotate the ship, the up and down keys for forward and backward thrust and [Esc] to access the pause menu.

Possible plans for this game in the future include: multiple planets with a navigation system, zoom-in when landing, ship upgrades, enemies and asteroids.

This is the first video game I made, I hope you enjoy it.
